programme.desc: Police are staggered by a thief who uses many disguises when he confesses to far more than they could imagine. Plus how the net closed on a gang stealing sentimental jewellery.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Dion heads to the seaside town of Mablethorpe in Lincolnshire to see a detached two-bed bungalow thats seen better days. Hes also in Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, to see a two-bed semi-detached house bought by two property developing brothers. Jacqui is just outside Norwich, visiting a characterful, Grade II listed cottage.

programme.desc: The whole town has turned out for a half marathon. When an under-prepared Clint collapses, Port Devines newest police officer - hunky ex-rugby player Donal - carries him over the finish line. Clint needs a doctor, so glamorous GP Sasha hurries over to assist - and the attraction between herself and Donal is instant. But as the pair help Clint towards Sashas car, the vehicle explodes.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A health-conscious couple from London enlist Sonali Shah to help them spend £1.3million on a detached property in Surrey with enough land to create a wellness retreat. Taking a breather from house hunting, Sonali immerses herself in the countys ancient woodlands as she learns about the Japanese practice of forest bathing.

programme.title: The Repair Shop: On the Road
programme.sub-title: Dumfries and Galloway - A Book for Lockerbie
programme.desc: The team help commemorate the victims of the Lockerbie bombing, new automata expert Michael tackles a clockwork train, and Kirsten gets hands on with medieval slipware pottery.

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz, packed with strategy, high stakes and surprises, where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret stash of cash - anything between zero and a whopping £4,000.

programme.title: Pointless

programme.title: Policing Paradise
programme.desc: On duty at Bermudas international airport is officer Paul Watson. The subtropical island has strict laws on the importation of narcotics, and the British-born Bobby known as Geordie works alongside airport customs to keep the airport free of drugs. But with 800,000 passengers flying into the island each year, its never easy. Officers stop a suspicious group of young people and discover one of them is carrying a vape containing THC, the active ingredient in cannabis.

programme.title: Return to Paradise
programme.desc: A scientist working at a shark research lab is found dead on a runaway boat. Mack suspects the death is a meticulously planned murder.

programme.desc: BBC THREE: Refreshing TV for the digital age. Tune in daily from 7.00pm.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Horrible Histories favourite, Death of `Stupid Deaths fame presents his very own show crammed full of spooky highlights. We join him at home and get a good look around as he reveals his creepiest moments. Then later on, Death himself is joined by some rather creepy friends to sing about his favourite scary things.

programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: An orphan and his grandmother travel to a seaside resort at precisely the same time that the worlds Grand High Witch has gathered her fellow cronies from around the globe - under cover - to carry out her nefarious plans.

programme.title: Mrs Browns Boys
programme.sub-title: Mrs Browns Boys Live - 10 Year Anniversary
programme.desc: Its Halloween in Finglas, and everyone is getting into the spooky spirit of things. Agnes is ready for the trick or treaters, but she gets more than she bargained for when she receives a surprising visitor from her past. As no-one else can see her ghostly guest, they think shes gone mad - not even Doctor Flynn can help. Luckily, Father Damien is on hand, and with a little help from Grandad, they get rid of the unwanted guest in time to head down to Foleys for a fancy-dress party.

programme.title: Inside No. 9
programme.desc: When Arthur Flitwick finds an old mobile phone in his local graveyard, he makes the mistake of trying to contact the owner, but some mysteries are best left unsolved and as Halloween draws near Arthur is plunged into a nightmare of his own making. It seems that no good deed can go unpunished, in this world or the next.

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: The last instalment in the `Scream trilogy is set in Hollywood, where `Stab 3 is being shot, with Gale Weathers and Dwight Riley on set as advisors to Jennifer Jolie. Unfortunately, a killer decides to off the cast in the order of the screenplay and only `Sid Prescott, now in hiding until the killer tracks her down, can solve the riddle.

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Tian Eleri investigates the story of Scottish medium Helen Duncan, who in 1944 became the last person convicted and imprisoned under the Witchcraft Act. As the Blitz rained down on London, Helen went on trail at the Old Bailey.

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Theres an unnerving breakthrough in Sians investigation into a woman who claimed to summon spirits of the dead when she finds an audio recording of a Helen Duncan seance. Not only is a gravelly male spirit heard to speak, but the people gathered comment that they see and recognise him. How is this possible? Sian tests out different theories - was it someone else speaking?

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.sub-title: Britains Last Witch: Bringing Back the Dead
programme.desc: Theres only a handful of mediums worldwide who claim to do anything close to what Helen Duncan said she could and physically manifest spirits into a room. For Sian, the only way to fully understand what was happening at Helens seances is to witness this for herself, so she tracks one of these rare mediums down in the Netherlands. Sian arrives at the Dutch monastery and is greeted by a host who takes Sian on a private tour of the seance room, where the medium will work that evening.

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.sub-title: Britains Last Witch: The Final Seance
programme.desc: Sians mission to get to the truth behind Helen Duncans apparently supernatural abilities draws to a close - but a secret package sent from Helens granddaughter in America leaves Sian with what appears to be the smoking gun she has been waiting for. The package contains what seems to be unexplainable proof that a spirit revealed the sinking of a second warship during one of Helens seances.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: As Mobeens investigation deepens, it becomes clearer that illicit relationships between prisoners and jail staff are just the tip of the iceberg. The bigger story involves organised criminal gangs determined to cash in on a lucrative prison drug economy. When news breaks of a prison governor being jailed for a relationship with a drug-dealing gang boss, Mobeen becomes determined to uncover the true extent of criminal influence inside our prisons.

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestones
programme.desc: Sian Eleris investigation into the haunting of Penyffordd Farm continues as multiple witnesses claim to have seen a hooded figure. She wonders whether they could really have all imagined the same thing.

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestones
programme.desc: Sians investigation into an allegedly haunted house in North Wales concludes. She must track down the last family members and solve whether this really was paranormal or all a hoax.

programme.desc: BBC THREE: Refreshing TV for the digital age. Tune in daily from 7.00pm.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Its Halloween in Bikini Bottom, and the Flying Dutchman is going to make sure everyones scared, even SpongeBob!

programme.title: Doctor Who Confidential
programme.desc: Cameras follow the team as they travel the length and breadth of the UK to launch the new series, getting up close and personal with Matt Smith and Karen Gillan as they journey from Belfast to London, taking in emotional whistle-stop visits to their home towns along the way. Plus, theres a look at the creation of the stunning underground city.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor battles to prevent an all out war between the Silurians and the humans. But a potential apocalypse looms.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Stacey and Gavin return from honeymoon to a big welcome from both families. However, Smithy seems none too happy with his best mate and Nessa has a confession to make that throws the whole evening into disarray.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Devastated by the news hes to become a father, Smithy goes AWOL. The boys finally track him down, but can he be persuaded to do the right thing? Stacey is shocked to hear of Gwens new domestic arrangements as the prospect of living in Essex finally hits her.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Gemma receives dodgy life advice from her incarcerated sister Catherine and Rita, her alcoholic boss. Worried that she will be having the baby alone, Gemma enlists Cherry to help her find a suitable, ideally rich, father for her unborn child. Meanwhile, Malcolm thinks he has found love with a woman online. Gemma educates him on the perils of catfishing - but Derek encourages Malcolm to meet her.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Gemma attends birthing classes led by a very eccentric antenatal teacher. Realising she needs more support, she seeks advice from her aunt Jess, Malcolms sister. She and Malcolm get invited to Jess and her domineering husband Tyrones new house for a party, but Malcolm is scared of Tyrone, who intimidates him with his new hot tub.

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: RuPauls search for the UKs Next Drag Race Superstar continues.Its Rusical week! The pressure is on as the queens singing, dancing and acting skills are challenged in Peter Pansy - The Rusical. West End musical theatre legend Mazz Murray joins head judge, RuPaul, alongside Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel as the curtain comes down on yet another queen. Which queen will be the Tinker Bell of the ball, and who will sashay away from a happy ending?

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: Fresh new talent aim to impress famous faces and follow in the footsteps of some of stand-ups biggest names. Across a number of rounds, comedians compete to show they could be the next breakout comedy star.

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: Birminghams Hockley Social Club has been transformed into our very own comedy club. Taking to the stage are Eli Hart, Farhan Solo, Chloe Reynolds, Will BF and Monica Hsueh in a bid to impress our judges and book their place in the final. Award-winning comedian and writer Sarah Keyworth is here to keep the house in order. The judges are comedian, writer and podcaster Aurie Styla and local Brum stand-up Lindsey Santoro. Head judge Fatiha El-Ghorri completes the trio.

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: The BBCs big comedy talent search, the New Comedy Awards is scouring the country to uncover the hottest new stand-ups. Ee head to the capital and the historic Alexandra Palace, home of the BBCs first broadcast. Five comics will battle it out to book their place in this years grand final showdown, where one will be crowned the BBC New Comedian of 2025. Hosting the comedy extravaganza is comedian, actor, presenter and writer Sara Pascoe.

programme.title: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps
programme.desc: Jonny goes for his interview at the biscuit factory, Janet gets the chance to be a star, and Gaz has to confront his greatest fear - sheep. Plus, Louise struggles to keep Mick.

programme.title: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps
programme.desc: Janet is offered the job of a lifetime on a cruise ship, but it means leaving Jonny and Corinthian behind. Meanwhile, Louise discovers the truth about her parents, and Donna buys a new business.

programme.title: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps
programme.desc: Janet gets a new job, but Donnas career is on the skids, Louise has a letter from her earth mother, but she cant open it, and Jonny campaigns for baby changing facilities at the pub.

programme.title: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps
programme.desc: Gaz decides its time to make a proper commitment to Donna, Janet tries talking dirty for a living, and Louise is in for a shock when she finally meets her real parents.

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK

programme.title: This Is BBC THREE
programme.desc: BBC THREE: Refreshing TV for the digital age. Tune in daily from 7.00pm.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Horrible Histories favourite, Death of `Stupid Deaths fame presents his very own show crammed full of spooky highlights. We join him at home and get a good look around as he reveals his creepiest moments. Then later on, Death himself is joined by some rather creepy friends to sing about his favourite scary things.

programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: An orphan and his grandmother travel to a seaside resort at precisely the same time that the worlds Grand High Witch has gathered her fellow cronies from around the globe - under cover - to carry out her nefarious plans.

programme.title: Mrs Browns Boys
programme.sub-title: Mrs Browns Boys Live - 10 Year Anniversary
programme.desc: Its Halloween in Finglas, and everyone is getting into the spooky spirit of things. Agnes is ready for the trick or treaters, but she gets more than she bargained for when she receives a surprising visitor from her past. As no-one else can see her ghostly guest, they think shes gone mad - not even Doctor Flynn can help. Luckily, Father Damien is on hand, and with a little help from Grandad, they get rid of the unwanted guest in time to head down to Foleys for a fancy-dress party.

programme.title: Inside No. 9
programme.desc: When Arthur Flitwick finds an old mobile phone in his local graveyard, he makes the mistake of trying to contact the owner, but some mysteries are best left unsolved and as Halloween draws near Arthur is plunged into a nightmare of his own making. It seems that no good deed can go unpunished, in this world or the next.

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: The last instalment in the `Scream trilogy is set in Hollywood, where `Stab 3 is being shot, with Gale Weathers and Dwight Riley on set as advisors to Jennifer Jolie. Unfortunately, a killer decides to off the cast in the order of the screenplay and only `Sid Prescott, now in hiding until the killer tracks her down, can solve the riddle.

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Tian Eleri investigates the story of Scottish medium Helen Duncan, who in 1944 became the last person convicted and imprisoned under the Witchcraft Act. As the Blitz rained down on London, Helen went on trail at the Old Bailey.

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Theres an unnerving breakthrough in Sians investigation into a woman who claimed to summon spirits of the dead when she finds an audio recording of a Helen Duncan seance. Not only is a gravelly male spirit heard to speak, but the people gathered comment that they see and recognise him. How is this possible? Sian tests out different theories - was it someone else speaking?

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.sub-title: Britains Last Witch: Bringing Back the Dead
programme.desc: Theres only a handful of mediums worldwide who claim to do anything close to what Helen Duncan said she could and physically manifest spirits into a room. For Sian, the only way to fully understand what was happening at Helens seances is to witness this for herself, so she tracks one of these rare mediums down in the Netherlands. Sian arrives at the Dutch monastery and is greeted by a host who takes Sian on a private tour of the seance room, where the medium will work that evening.

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.sub-title: Britains Last Witch: The Final Seance
programme.desc: Sians mission to get to the truth behind Helen Duncans apparently supernatural abilities draws to a close - but a secret package sent from Helens granddaughter in America leaves Sian with what appears to be the smoking gun she has been waiting for. The package contains what seems to be unexplainable proof that a spirit revealed the sinking of a second warship during one of Helens seances.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: As Mobeens investigation deepens, it becomes clearer that illicit relationships between prisoners and jail staff are just the tip of the iceberg. The bigger story involves organised criminal gangs determined to cash in on a lucrative prison drug economy. When news breaks of a prison governor being jailed for a relationship with a drug-dealing gang boss, Mobeen becomes determined to uncover the true extent of criminal influence inside our prisons.

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestones
programme.desc: Sian Eleris investigation into the haunting of Penyffordd Farm continues as multiple witnesses claim to have seen a hooded figure. She wonders whether they could really have all imagined the same thing.

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestones
programme.desc: Sians investigation into an allegedly haunted house in North Wales concludes. She must track down the last family members and solve whether this really was paranormal or all a hoax.

programme.title: Global Eye
programme.desc: Bringing forensic journalism from all corners of the world by BBC Eye, the World Services critically acclaimed investigative unit, and featuring expert global correspondents getting to the heart of the biggest international stories.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz, packed with strategy, high stakes and surprises, where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret stash of cash - anything between zero and a whopping £4,000.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martin struggles to keep his balance at a Liverpool house that feels like its sloping away. Jacqui is in Kent, where damp is all around. In London, Tommy thinks a layout change is in order at a one-bedroom flat.

programme.title: Chronicles of the Sperrins
programme.desc: Its summer in the mountains. While some honour traditions like Cairn Sunday and village sport in Donemana, others seek out the wilder places, in search of natures mysteries.

programme.title: Weatherman Walking
programme.desc: Derek hits the Welsh coast where he tries sand-sledging and horse-riding.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Political Thinking with Nick Robinson
programme.desc: Nick Robinson has a conversation with, not an interrogation of, the people who shape our political thinking about what shaped theirs.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: The Finish Line
programme.desc: Roman Kemp and sidekick Sarah Greene host the quiz show where contestants race on moving podiums across the studio floor. Correct answers get the players moving, while wrong answers will stop them in their tracks.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Today, Ashleigh, Lisa, Naesan and Andrew battle it out to see which one of them is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: North East England and Yorkshire: Starter and Fish
programme.desc: Four chefs compete for north east England and Yorkshire with canapes, starters and fish dishes inspired by great Britons of the past. Who will be eliminated?

programme.title: Thailand: Earths Tropical Paradise
programme.desc: Northern Thailand is dominated by mountains and cloaked in forest. It hides ancient creatures and surprising partnerships. To survive here both the wildlife and people rely on maintaining the natural harmony of the mysterious north.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: The team are at Herstmonceux Castle in Sussex, where antiques experts James Lewis and Catherine Southon unearth treasures brought in by visitors to sell at auction. A Chinese wall plaque catches Jamess eye, and Paul Martin explores the history of Herstmonceux Castle.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Jack Carroll, Dani Harmer, Dominic Littlewood and Shivi Ramoutar test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Fleur East is on hand with more Strictly exclusives ahead of the weekends Halloween extravaganza. And a star-studded Friday Panel discuss the couples next dances as they take to the ballroom floor.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Ben Robinson heads to Beer, Devon, home to beer stone, which has been quarried since Roman times and used in many of the nations cathedrals and landmark buildings including Westminster Abbey, the Tower of London and St Pauls Cathedral. Ben finds ancient Roman arches in the quarry and discovers the stones origin in the villages unique white cliffs.

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.sub-title: River Itchen, Hampshire - Wild Brown Trout
programme.desc: Paul and Bob travel to Hampshire to fly fish in the idyllic River Itchen with their trusty canine friend Ted in tow.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Its an exciting week at Longmeadow as Monty makes a start on his new woodland garden. Advolly Richmond looks at the history of Gertrude Jekyll, and Carol Klein revels in the displays at RHS Rosemoor.

programme.title: Book Club
programme.desc: Four friends lives are turned upside down when their book club tackles the infamous "50 Shades of Grey." From discovering new romance to rekindling old flames, they inspire each other to make their next chapter the best chapter.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig takes a QI look at Wings and Wheels with Aisling Bea, Hank Green, Desiree Burch and Alan Davies.

programme.title: Dont Look Now
programme.desc: A woman has recurring visions of her dead daughter while travelling to Venice with her husband. They meet two elderly sisters, one of whom informs the mother that she can contact her dead daughter.

programme.title: Panorama
programme.desc: Current affairs programme, featuring interviews and investigative reports on all aspects of life in Britain.

programme.title: Riot Women
programme.desc: Struggling to process the shock of her discovery, Kitty starts behaving badly, leading to an explosive family Sunday lunch at Beths house.

programme.sub-title: The One With the Inappropriate Sister

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Resolutions
programme.desc: The friends make their New Year resolutions, and Joey tries to arrange for Chandler to kiss Monica at midnight at a New Years Eve party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandlers Work Laugh
programme.desc: Monica is annoyed when she discovers Chandler is ingratiating himself with his new boss Doug. He even has a fake laugh which he uses whenever Doug cracks a joke. programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: At her grandmothers funeral, Phoebe is astounded to meet her biological father, Frank Sr, who she has been trying to find for years. Elsewhere, Chandler tells perfectionist Monica that she is useless at massage, and Joeys fondness for an expensive bag loses him an audition.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Everybody Finds Out
programme.desc: Chandler and Monicas relationship becomes less of a secret, and Ross must prove to his boss that hes sane in order to return to work.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl Who Hits Joey
programme.desc: Chandler becomes anxious when he thinks Monica wants more from their relationship, and Ross moves into his new apartment and fails to impress his new neighbours. programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Inadvertent Kiss

Meanwhile, Monica competes to have a better relationship than Phoebes, and Joey is arrested for stalking a sexy neighbour with whom Ross gets a date.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachels new boss and colleague both smoke. When Rachel discovers that they make business decisions without her in the smoking room, she pretends to be a serious smoker so she can be part of the discussion. programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Cant Flirt

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Ride Along
programme.desc: The gang persuade Phoebes policeman boyfriend to let them ride in his police car. The friends enjoy the experience, until a gunshot rings out. Elsewhere, Rachel overhears a telephone message for Ross from his second ex-wife.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: After Gary confides in Monica that he intends to ask Phoebe to move in with him, Monica immediately breaks her promise to him and tells Phoebe, who worries that it is too early in the relationship. She persuades Chandler to talk to Gary, hoping that Chandlers fear of commitment will rub off on him, but Garys enthusiasm overwhelms even Chandler.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys Big Break
programme.desc: Joeys first major film role leads to an unexpected experience in Las Vegas. Meanwhile, Phoebe cant quite remember why she hates Ross.

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: After considering retirement, Satan decides to hang on for another 10,000 years, angering his older sons and heirs. They decamp to New York and seal Hell shut, but without a regular supply of souls, Satan could literally evaporate into thin air. His only hope lies in his nerdy youngest son, but even with the help of Valerie and a talking dog, hes going to have problems persuading his bigger brothers to return to Hell.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Frank offers to paint Rays house but refuses to paint it the colour that Ray and Debra want.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: As Ray escorts Ally to a father-daughter dance, he realises how grown up and independent his daughter has become, and recalls the day when she was born.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Thanksgivings
programme.desc: As the gang digests Monicas huge Thanksgiving meal, everyone reminisces about their worst Thanksgiving ever.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Warning notes on Ross lunch causes concern among his co-workers, and Phoebe takes a literature class.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Inappropriate Sister
programme.desc: After returning from another disappointing audition, Joey tries to write a play in which he can star. Meanwhile, Rachel gets a date with her neighbour Danny, but is perturbed to discover his extremely intimate relationship with his sexy sister.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Resolutions
programme.desc: The friends make their New Year resolutions, and Joey tries to arrange for Chandler to kiss Monica at midnight at a New Years Eve party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandlers Work Laugh
programme.desc: Monica is annoyed when she discovers Chandler is ingratiating himself with his new boss Doug. He even has a fake laugh which he uses whenever Doug cracks a joke. Meanwhile, Rachel is obsessed with finding out the gossip between Monica and Chandler after overhearing a sexy conversation between them, and Ross astounds everyone with his new girlfriend, a blast from the past.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: At her grandmothers funeral, Phoebe is astounded to meet her biological father, Frank Sr, who she has been trying to find for years. Elsewhere, Chandler tells perfectionist Monica that she is useless at massage, and Joeys fondness for an expensive bag loses him an audition.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Everybody Finds Out
programme.desc: Chandler and Monicas relationship becomes less of a secret, and Ross must prove to his boss that hes sane in order to return to work.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl Who Hits Joey
programme.desc: Chandler becomes anxious when he thinks Monica wants more from their relationship, and Ross moves into his new apartment and fails to impress his new neighbours. Meanwhile, Joey is afraid to end his relationship with a diminutive woman who punches him hard every time she thinks something is fun.

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: Warm-hearted tale about an all-American family who adopt a loveable puppy, little realising that the creature will grow into a 185-pound St Bernard. As Beethoven grows ever larger, the father becomes hostile, but the whole family rallies together when an evil dog-napper menaces their pet.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: Featuring music from Emeli Sande, stand up comedy from rising star Joe Lycett, comedy material from Michael himself and Strictly hero Ed Balls plays Celebrity Send To All. And one unsuspecting member of the public will get the surprise of their life.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds a police officers badge and goes on a spree of arrests until she meets up with the owner, while Joey wonders if he is in love with Monica.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Inadvertent Kiss
programme.desc: Rachel has an interview for her dream job at Ralph Lauren. All goes well until she inadvertently kisses the interviewer, and at the second interview she mistakenly berates him for his `sexual intentions. Meanwhile, Monica competes to have a better relationship than Phoebes, and Joey is arrested for stalking a sexy neighbour with whom Ross gets a date.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachels new boss and colleague both smoke. When Rachel discovers that they make business decisions without her in the smoking room, she pretends to be a serious smoker so she can be part of the discussion. Meanwhile, Rosss son and Joey audition for the same commercial, but only one of them can get the part.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Cant Flirt
programme.desc: Ross really likes the pretty pizza-delivery woman, but his flirting technique is awful. Meanwhile, a nasty surprise awaits Joey when he tells everyone about his big television appearance.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Ride Along
programme.desc: The gang persuade Phoebes policeman boyfriend to let them ride in his police car. The friends enjoy the experience, until a gunshot rings out. Elsewhere, Rachel overhears a telephone message for Ross from his second ex-wife.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: After Gary confides in Monica that he intends to ask Phoebe to move in with him, Monica immediately breaks her promise to him and tells Phoebe, who worries that it is too early in the relationship. She persuades Chandler to talk to Gary, hoping that Chandlers fear of commitment will rub off on him, but Garys enthusiasm overwhelms even Chandler.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys Big Break
programme.desc: Joeys first major film role leads to an unexpected experience in Las Vegas. Meanwhile, Phoebe cant quite remember why she hates Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang travel to Las Vegas, Nevada, where more than one surprise awaits them. After Ross misinterprets Rachels actions, a war of public humiliation results.

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: After considering retirement, Satan decides to hang on for another 10,000 years, angering his older sons and heirs. They decamp to New York and seal Hell shut, but without a regular supply of souls, Satan could literally evaporate into thin air. His only hope lies in his nerdy youngest son, but even with the help of Valerie and a talking dog, hes going to have problems persuading his bigger brothers to return to Hell.

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: The Man Between
programme.desc: In crumbling post-war Berlin, Ivo Kern and Susanne Mallison get caught up in a maelstrom of bigamy, blackmail and bullets as Communist agents attempt to stem the flow of refugees into the West. Packed with edgy suspense, panting romance and wonderfully shady characters, the film chases through the skilfully realised tensions of the divided city towards a breathless finale.

programme.title: Gideon of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: London Inspector Gideon faces outrage and danger in his quest to bring the capitals criminals to justice. Comic tone offsets the drama, with an occasional sense of menace hinting at Fords mastery of the medium.

programme.title: Footsteps in the Fog
programme.desc: A sinister aristocrat poisons his wife and his maid knows what he has done and uses this knowledge to her advantage. Will the fact that she knows too much put her in danger with her murderous boss?

programme.title: Dead of Night

programme.title: The Popes Exorcist
programme.desc: Father Gabriele Amorth, chief exorcist for the Vatican, battles Satan and innocent-possessing demons. A detailed portrait of a priest who performed more than 100,000 exorcisms in his lifetime.

programme.title: Warlock
programme.desc: A 17th-century Satanist and the witch hunter who snared him are propelled 300 years into the future.

programme.title: The Masque of the Red Death
programme.desc: Stylish chiller about the evil Prince Prospero, a medieval Italian prince, devoted to the pursuit of evil and the worship of Satan, who enjoys the high life in his eerie country castle as the Red Plague destroys the peasant population around him. Loosely adapted from two Edgar Allan Poe tales by cult director Roger Corman.

programme.desc: Nigel Slater shows that spicy food isnt all about hot chillis. Using a range of everyday spices, he creates a weeks worth of tasty dishes that will appeal to everyone. programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Suppers
programme.desc: Nigel Slater shows how to make simple delicious feasts out of ingredients that at first seem to have seen better days. Nigels cheese puddings, banana and chocolate cake and bacon and squash pan fry are all guaranteed to make mouths water.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Christmas Suppers

He creates simple dishes from leftovers and seasonal veg, ensuring that nothing goes to waste.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Cooking Christmas
programme.desc: Culinary champion Nigel Slater reveals fantastic festive recipes, including a sumptuous casserole, that will warm cockles and fill hungry stomachs throughout the Christmas period.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters 12 Tastes of Christmas

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew and Tee travel to four extraordinary locations across Northern Italy, including the countrys most famed antique markets and a dreamy Tuscan villa.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew and Tee go hunting for antiques in the homes of fellow dealers. Tucked away in the Cotswolds, Drew finds an ancient Greek masterpiece from 100BC.

programme.title: Celebrity Fantasy Homes
programme.desc: Celebrities hunt for a new home. Gaby Roslin helps punk pop princess Toyah Willcox search for a second home, in Richmond upon Thames, with a budget of £650,000.

programme.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
programme.desc: A definitive one-stop shop for all things cruise, bringing you the hottest destinations and the latest deals to ensure that your next cruise ship holiday is your greatest one yet.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Nicki Chapman is property shopping with a buyer looking to swap the hustle and bustle of London for the tranquillity of the Shropshire countryside on a budget of £350,000. Nicki also delves deep into the countys mining heritage when she descends underground at the end of a rope.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew visits a disused fuel shed on a former air force base in Suffolk, where he discovers vases carved from cow bones and a haunting stone face corbel.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew and Tee visit Newark, a town renowned for its antique connections. Drew finds a set of Regency bed steps and a genuine, very rare 18th-century mirror.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew and Tree visit Insect Circus in Suffolk, where they discover a giant pair of 20th century stage shoes and scratch-made models of fairground rides.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Resident clock maker Steve tackles an intricate Boulle-work clock that hasnt ticked for over fifteen years. Meanwhile soft toy restorers Julie and Amanda take on a Jumbo-sized project in the shape of a threadbare, but much loved, wheeled elephant. Woodwork specialist Will get to grips with one of the Repair Shops oldest ever assignments: a three hundred year old Georgian desk that is showing its age.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Blacksmith Matthew Boultwood takes on a piece of British military history: a ceremonial helmet from one of the oldest regiments in the army, the Life Guards. Also forming part of the Household Calvary that provide personal protection for the monarch, this helmet may well have stood guard outside Buckingham Palace during the reign of Queen Victoria. After years in a damp attic Matt has a real challenge to get it back in parade ground condition once again.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Taz and Tracy from London are looking for a holiday home on Cyprus, where Tazs family are originally from. Scarlette Douglas hopes to find them the perfect place around Protaras.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell revisit some of their most extraordinary searches to find out what happened after the families were reunited. They discover how these remarkable reunions have transformed peoples lives, and what it is like to build a relationship with a family member after a lifetime apart.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next
programme.desc: Following reunited siblings Geoffrey Tonks and Barbara Jacobs as they investigate a family mystery and try to trace a missing sister. Geoffrey was the product of a war-time affair and spent his early years in Barnardos. Before Barbara asked the `Long Lost Family team to find him, he had never met a single blood relative and his unhappy childhood meant he had no desire to learn about his past.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team are called out to peoples homes with a mission to sift through a lifetime of possessions and find forgotten treasures that can be sold at auction.

programme.title: Celebrity Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team help celebrities clear their homes of clutter. They look for hidden gems to be auctioned off for profit.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: An unreliable classic car has Charles Hanson and James Braxton complete this leg on foot! After buying antiques in Perthshire and the Lothians, Charles hears how drovers would move cattle from the Scottish Highlands to market in Stirling and has a jolly good go at it himself. Meanwhile, James learns about Einsteins inspiration and one of the greatest scientists in history, James Clerk Maxwell.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Its the last leg of a rip roaring road trip for James Braxton and Charles Hanson. Starting in Scotland theyll head south over the border to take their final purchases to auction in Berwick-upon-Tweed. Charles dresses in full Highland regalia to hear how Sir Walter Scott reinvented tartan. Meanwhile, James discovers the story behind one of the most intriguing incidents of World War Two.

programme.title: Yorkshire Air 999
programme.desc: The crew fly to six-year-old Esme, who is having a seizure at school. On the Leeds-Liverpool Canal, a holiday-maker is unconscious on a narrowboat.

programme.title: Inside The Arrest
programme.desc: Its only when 35-year-old Virginia McCullough is arrested at her home for the murder of her parents that officers discover her gruesome secret.

programme.title: Yorkshire Air 999
programme.desc: The team fly to the Yorkshire Dales to rescue a rock climber with serious injuries after a big fall on one of Yorkshires highest mountains.

programme.title: Help! My House is Haunted
programme.desc: Clare has moved seven times, but each home seems plagued by paranormal encounters. However, her current house in Huntington is the worst. With her familys safety at stake, she turns to the team to break the terrifying activity once and for all.

programme.title: Help! My House is Haunted
programme.desc: Tim, Christine and their three children have lived in their Bristol house for 25 years. But something sinister has been increasingly taunting them. Desperate for help, they call in the team, who uncover that something inhuman could be at play.

programme.desc: Tyrion chastens Cersei for alienating the kings subjects; Arya shares a secret with Gendry; one of Danys scouts returns with news; Theon Greyjoy reunites with his father; Davos enlists a pirate to join forces with Stannis and Melisandre.

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: A driven young man named Lou stumbles upon the underground world of Los Angeles freelance crime journalism.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony B. and Christopher unearth some old memories; Tony and Carmela plan another party; Janice is sent to anger management therapy.

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: The Capaccios strike out at Sangue Blu as they set out to conquer Forcella. An isolated Enzo risks not only losing his turf, but also his mens loyalty.

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: Having realised the cause of all of her misfortunes, Patrizia is forced to face up to a life-changing decision.

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Trouble looms for Job when he heads to New York to track down Rabbit. Plus, Ana drops a bombshell on Gordon.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: What Is Dead May Never Die
programme.desc: Tyrion plots to gain alliances through the promise of marriage; Catelyn arrives in the Stormlands; Luwin tries to decipher Brans dreams.

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Richard E Grant looks at the secrets of hotels.

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Heading to the Big Easy to visit the citys finest hotels, including the Monteleone, popular with writers such as F Scott Fitzgerald.

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming (The Good Wife) embarks on a tour of the UK, uncovering the secrets of some of Britains cities. Beginning in London, he travels from St Pauls Cathedral to Soho.

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cummings tour of the UK continues as he uncovers more secrets in its urban areas. This week, hes in Brighton where he travels from the toy museum to the Royal Pavilion.

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: In Bristol, Alan Cumming uncovers a grisly secret at the docks before his journey takes him deep underground in Clifton. He also visits the citys first speakeasy.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Robb presents himself to Walder Frey; Edmure meets his bride; Jon faces a harsh test; Bran discovers a new gift; Daario and Jorah debate; House Frey joins with House Tully.

programme.desc: Joffrey challenges Tywin; Bran tells a ghost story; Dany waits to see if she is a conqueror or a liberator.

programme.desc: Tyrion helps Jaime, Joffrey and Margaery host a breakfast, Stannis loses patience with Davos.

programme.desc: Dany balances justice and mercy, Brienne is tasked with Jaimes honor, Jon secures volunteers.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Cersei and Tywin plan the Crowns next move, Dany discusses future plans.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Laws of Gods and Men
programme.desc: Stannis and Davos set sail, Dany meets with supplicants and Tyrion faces down his father.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion gains an unlikely ally, Daario asks Dany to allow him to do what he does best, Jons warnings about the vulnerability of the Wall are ignored, and Brienne follows a new lead.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Unexpected visitors arrive in Moles Town. Littlefingers motives are questioned.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon Snow and the Nights Watch face a big challenge.

programme.title: The Iris Affair
programme.desc: Iris Nixon steals an enigmatic code from genius philanthropist Cameron Beck and disappears. A tense countdown ensues as she races to unravel the codes mystery, with Cameron in pursuit.

programme.title: Big Little Lies
programme.desc: Madeline is outraged over a slight from Renata while dealing with family issues at home. Jane dodges difficult questions from Ziggy.

programme.title: IT: Welcome to Derry
programme.desc: Following the events in the 1960s, the time leading up to the events of the first film in the Stephen King "It" series.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony Bs boss, Mr Kim, offers to finance a massage parlour to be run by his daughter and Tony, however all does not go to plan when Tony feels Mr Kim is not pulling his weight. Elsewhere, AJ remains perilously close to failing English so Carmela visits Mr Wegler, who persuades her to go to dinner with him, and then to sleep with him.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: While attending the funeral of his Aunt Concetta, Tony visits his parents gravesite and finds Fran Felstein, Johnny Sopranos long-time mistress. Intrigued by Fran, Tony starts spending time with her. In a session with Dr Melfi, Tony reveals that when he was a teenager he once lied to his mother, who was hospitalised following a miscarriage, regarding his fathers whereabouts.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony does his best to steer clear of the New York turf struggle. Meanwhile, Little Carmines camp is clandestinely courting Tony Blundetto. On the home front, Carmela throws a 75th birthday barbecue for her father, Hugh. Tony is not initially invited to the party, but Hugh insists that he be there. Carmela relents, and Tony attends the party. Later that evening, Tony and Carmela find themselves alone.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Outside influences affect the way the worlds first thinking, feeling robot lives and behaves.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: A Mexican village is at the mercy of Calvera, the leader of a band of outlaws. The townspeople, too afraid to fight for themselves, hire seven American gunslingers to free them from the bandits raids. The professional gunmen train the villagers to defend themselves, then plan a trap for the evil Calvera.

programme.title: White Elephant
programme.desc: When two cops witness an assassination attempt, a ruthless crime boss orders Gabriel Tancredi, an ex-Marine turned mob enforcer, to eliminate any and all threats.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: A true story of two remaining officers desperately trying to rally their meagre force of 105 men against 4,000 attacking Zulu warriors. Cetewayo, ruler of the Zulu kingdom, begins his war against the white invaders with the annihilation of the British army at Isandhlwana and moves on to his next target - the depleted garrison at Rorkes Drift.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.desc: A half-human, half-vampire superhero hunts down the brutal bloodsucking creature who infected his mother.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Noahs Ark
programme.desc: A pair of mice, Vini and Tom, devise a plan to sneak onto Noahs Ark.

programme.title: Rebellious
programme.desc: A headstrong princess is stolen by an evil sorcerer, and her scholarly fiance must use his wits in an epic quest to find her while she boldly challenges her captors and plots a daring escape.

programme.title: Open Season: Scared Silly
programme.desc: The humans and animals believe a werewolf is on the loose, so former hunter Shaw uses the opportunity to re-open the season. Boog, Elliot, and Mr Weenie have to face their fears and find the werewolf to get the season closed permanently.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Winter sprite Jack Frost must save the day when an evil boogeyman schemes to stop the worlds children from believing in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and other immortal Guardians.

programme.title: Fireheart
programme.desc: In New York City in 1932, women are not allowed to be firefighters. When the citys firemen disappear in mysterious fires, Georgia Nolan sees a golden opportunity. She disguises herself as Joe and joins a team of improvised firemen.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The sequel to `Madagascar, in which New York Zoo animals, Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family, but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the Central Park Zoo.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Flightless birds lead a mostly happy existence, except for Red, who just cant get past the daily annoyances of life. His temperament leads him to anger management class, where he meets fellow misfits Chuck and Bomb. Red becomes even more agitated when his feathered brethren welcome green pigs to their island paradise. As the swine begin to get under his skin, Red joins forces with Chuck and Bomb to investigate the real reason behind their mysterious arrival.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.desc: A pair of mice, Vini and Tom, devise a plan to sneak onto Noahs Ark.

programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The story of a pair of blues musicians who try to raise the money to save an orphanage by reuniting their old band - nearly writing off Chicago in the process.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: My First Summer
programme.desc: Isolated on a remote property, 16-year-old Claudia finds her sheltered world transformed when spirited teenager Grace appears in her garden, and the pair find a connection they both need.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: My First Summer
programme.desc: Isolated on a remote property, 16-year-old Claudia finds her sheltered world transformed when spirited teenager Grace appears in her garden, and the pair find a connection they both need.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing theyve left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing theyve left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountants trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A drought-devastated farmer is desperate for money and, for $200, agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train comes to take him to jail. However, the farmer has not reckoned on his prisoners psychological wiles and must resist manipulative strategies aimed at permitting him to escape.

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: A German ex-pat living in London is confronted by his past when hes asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer who is visiting London.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: An embittered Indian scout attempts to escort a homesteaders wife and her son back to safety after her cowardly husband deserts her during an Apache attack. When she refuses to go, the scout stays on to help for a while and, over time, forms a strong bond with both her and her son.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: Straight Outta Nowhere: Scooby-Doo! Meets Courage the Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo and the Gang find themselves in the middle of Nowhere, Kansas, the backwoods hometown of Courage and his owners, Muriel and Eustace Bagge.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: A high school senior befriends a strange subterranean creature after building a monster truck from bits and pieces of scrapped cars.

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: Creepy fairy tale following the fortunes of a young orphan who becomes embroiled in a supernatural adventure. Brought up on his kindly grandmothers scary stories about witches, he stumbles on a real coven while on holiday. Overhearing their plans to capture all the children in Britain, he sets out to stop them, remaining undeterred throughout - even when he has been turned into a mouse.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: A high school senior befriends a strange subterranean creature after building a monster truck from bits and pieces of scrapped cars.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Looking for the days when he felt like a `real ogre, shrek makes an ill advised pact with Rumpelstiltskin. Banished to a Shrek-less version of the land of Far Far Away, the unfortunate ogre must once again win the love of Princess Fiona if hes to ever get back home.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Lemony Snickets A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are sent to live with their uncle Count Olaf, but he only wants their family fortune. What follows is a battle of wits.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.
