programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal. Only one man survives, virologist Robert Neville. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: An amnesiac called Alice leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporations locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. The unit is sealed because of a virus that gassed all the staff but, as Alice and her team discover, the virus has re-animated them.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Gun-toting heroine Alice goes above ground to rid Raccoon City of a second plague of zombies, but the evil Umbrella Corporation and the military have a new secret weapon. With her allies, fellow survivors Jill Valentine, Carlos Oliviera and his Captain, Nicholai, she must battle a new and improved Matt Addison, code name: Nemesis.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Extinction
programme.desc: Survivors of a global plague are besieged in Las Vegas. The Umbrella Corporation wants Alice for her DNA. If the scientists dont get her, the zombies will.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
programme.desc: Alice continues her journey to find survivors after the world is hit by a virus infection which turns its victims in the Undead. With help from an old friend, Alice leads the survivors to Los Angeles, which she believes is a safe haven. However, its all a trap set up by the Umbrella Corporation, who want her dead.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
programme.desc: New allies and old friends aid Alice in her worldwide search for those responsible for the T-virus outbreak that continues to turn humans into flesh-eating zombies.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Alice travels to the Hive in Raccoon City to prevent the evil Umbrella Corp. from wiping out the last remaining survivors of the zombie apocalypse.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: David Dutton is the sheriff of picture-perfect American town Ogden Marsh. One night and out of the blue one of its citizens shows up during a baseball game with a shot-gun and ready to kill. This is the beginning of a spiral of violence and mayhem.

programme.title: Die Alone

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Curtis and his family are selected to test a revolutionary new device called AIA that takes smart homes to the next level. As AIA begins to learn everyones behaviour and anticipate their needs, it makes sure nothing and no one gets in their way.

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Disturbing visions and her sisters disappearance lead a woman to call a cop and a psychic to her childhood home.

programme.title: Salems Lot
programme.desc: A writer returns to his hometown and discovers that the residents are being turned into vampires.

programme.title: 47 Meters Down
programme.desc: Two sisters vacationing in Mexico become trapped in a shark cage on the ocean floor. As their oxygen starts to run out and with great white sharks circling them, the sisters must find a way to get to the surface alive.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.title: Salems Lot
programme.desc: A writer returns to his hometown and discovers that the residents are being turned into vampires.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Libertys head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8mm `snuff films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

programme.title: Bram Stokers Dracula
programme.desc: Retelling of the classic horror tale about Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince who is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Draculas castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harkers fiancee, Mina, the image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.desc: In 1970s London, a former member of the IRA sets out to avenge his wifes murder. Sky Original thriller starring Aml Ameen, Colin Morgan, Mark Strong and Felicity Jones.

programme.desc: A detective and a Secret Service agent investigate the abduction of a senators daughter from a school.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: Slick crime caper in which a thief, recently released from prison, rounds up a team of top criminals to rob three Las Vegas casinos owned by the man who is now dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is surprised to be approached by the Popes emissaries for help. Following the Popes recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiffs place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.desc: Steve returns home to the Atlantic waters of the British Isles as he considers the question of what humanity can do to ensure the enduring future of whales, which have already survived so much.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bats teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the teams solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend whos ready to fly.

programme.title: Pride Rules
programme.desc: Contend with the challenges of the rainy season, which turns everything green and spoils the lions camouflage.

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Novice fliers tackle their first ascents, earth-bound creatures soar uniquely and sky masters race with speed, power and agility.

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Each species evolves unique tools to outpace rivals in the eat-or-be-eaten game, taking to the skies is the ultimate advantage.

programme.title: Age of Big Cats
programme.desc: Saber-tooths rule the Pleistocene Era but the arrival of the new cats, early snow leopards, cheetahs and jaguars, mark a turning point in the evolutionary track.

programme.title: The Predators Playbook
programme.desc: An exploration of the unique features that allow predators to survive in often hostile environments,. such as speed and agility to undetectable camouflage.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Conquest of the Skies
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough charts the story of animals who defy gravity, starting with the planets first flyers: the insect.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Conquest of the Skies
programme.desc: After meeting some critters who glide through life in Borneo, Sir David Attenborough decides to turn back the clock.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Conquest of the Skies
programme.desc: In the final episode in the series, Sir David Attenborough turns his attention to the creatures that dominate our skies today.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: From the blond manes of golden snub-nose monkeys, to the flamingos pink feathers, get a front-row seat to natures most spectacular fashion show.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: For certain alphas - from gorillas and moose to pelicans and sharks - bigger is definitely better.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Two teams of researchers investigate the migration patterns of the oceans largest and deadliest sharks. They follow their underwater routes and show their hunting behaviours, and social hierarchies.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild
programme.desc: Its a critical time for two black rhinos in Zambia. Four year old female Apson and fourteen year old bull Kango are at the core of a complex relocation mission thats part of a grand plan to save a species.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild
programme.desc: Deep in Kafue National Park, the largest and wildest protected area in Zambia, a team of biologists and vets from the Zambian Carnivore Programme (ZCP) races against time to save and protect Africas apex predators.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: From the blond manes of golden snub-nose monkeys, to the flamingos pink feathers, get a front-row seat to natures most spectacular fashion show.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: For certain alphas - from gorillas and moose to pelicans and sharks - bigger is definitely better.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Two teams of researchers investigate the migration patterns of the oceans largest and deadliest sharks. They follow their underwater routes and show their hunting behaviours, and social hierarchies.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo strikes out to explore the Britain of his youth. Hes a boomer, born in the decade after the end of the Second World War, and he recalls the optimism and excitement of rebuilding a nation exhausted by conflict.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillos railway journey through north west England from Preston to Hebden Bridge reaches Greater Manchester, where Michael celebrates new beginnings for the nation in the years after the Second World War.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In the stalls of the Oldham Coliseum, the towns Victorian repertory theatre, Michael hears how the lifting of censorshop allowed theatres to stage risque productions from playwrights such as Tennessee Williams.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: From Wakefield, West Yorkshire, Michael visits the National Coal Mining Museum for England at Caphouse Colliery. He pauses to admire the tall spire of Wakefield Cathedral and its resident peregrine falcons.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek, with help from the Mathewson clan, drag a mini pickup out of the barn where its been for 20 years, and a 350cc Douglas Mark V motorbike from 1950 goes under the hammer.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Four VW camper vans pitch up at the auction house looking for a new home and Derek picks up an Austin 16 that goes like stink and has some unusual modern modifications.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: After the Allied landing in Normandy, France falls city after city - but a small island fortress off the coast becomes the stage for a harrowing act of Nazi defiance.

programme.title: Churchills Bid to Abolish Britain
programme.desc: Following an astonishing story which challenges our understanding of the Second World War and our perception of world-renowned leaders.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team return with a second helping from a recent visit to Hertford College, Oxford. Objects under the cameras include a bracelet once worn by a princess with a tragic story; expensive ceramics bought for a song at a boot sale; and a rare document recording the end of hostilities in the First World War. Plus, one of the experts shows his hand as an accomplished amateur potter.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team head for the beautiful Tamar Valley in Devon, and weigh anchor at Morwellham Quay. Objects fascinating the experts include an ugly brown jug with a handsome valuation, a stunning and rare silver salver, and a long case clock arrives in unexpected fashion.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek navigates the dry stone walls of the Peak District to collect a very original 1988 Opel Manta, Dave handles a rare Ford Granada rally support vehicle, and Paul contends with a Hilux monster truck.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek takes a long drive in a 1960s bus that has had a life in the sun, Dave helps a collector trim his fleet of British classics by taking a Triumph TR7 convertible for auction, and Paul is confused by an agricultural Bonser truck.

programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team return with a second helping from a recent visit to Hertford College, Oxford. Plus, one of the experts shows his hand as an accomplished amateur potter.
